name: MatrixMath
description: # Matrix MathThis script provides a library of matrix mathematical operations for linear algebra and 2D affine transformations. It has no behavior on its own and is meant to be used by other scripts to do neat things, particularly for transforming geometric systems.All of this scripts operations are exposed through the ```MatrixMath``` object.## Other scriptsMatrixMath has no dependencies, but it does play nice with the ```VectorMath``` script's library, particularly for ```MatrixMath.multiply()``` when used to transform a vector.## Unit testsUnit tests are implemented for all its operations, and they run automatically when the script is loaded.
